document.full_text: greece should complete talks by the end of the week with eu and imf inspectors on a medium-term budget plan plus a vital next slice of international aid, sources close to the negotiations said on wednesday.
document.title: greece nears imf/eu deal and dismisses drachma talk
lines_and_colors: greece should complete talks by the end of the week with eu and imf inspectors on a medium-term budget plan plus a vital next slice of international aid, sources close to the negotiations said on wednesday.
